issue.title: [CF 59] Temporary weapon enchant ranged slot shows head icon
issue.body:
Thanks for adding support for the ranged poison for rogues. Works fine, but it shows the icon of my helmet.

Just checked with TMW 2.1.0b


> Posted by CurseForge user erwinmeier | Imported from CurseForge issue #59 | Raw

comments.body:
Haha, that's weird. I'll look into it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

2.1.1 fixed this, thanks a lot


> Posted by CurseForge user erwinmeier
